sourcesContent:
import axios from "axios" import useSwr from "swr" import { useEffect } from "react"; import { useCookies } from 'react-cookie'; export default function Footer() { const [currency, setCurrencyCookie] = useCookies(['currency']); const fetcher = async (url) => await axios.get(url).then(res => res.data) const { data } = useSwr(`${process.env.API_URL}static/config`, fetcher, { revalidateOnFocus: false }) useEffect(() => { if (data && !currency) { let defaultCurrency = data.filter(d => d.value === 1) setCurrencyCookie('currency', defaultCurrency[0], { path: '/' }) } }, [data]) const setCurrency = (e) => { let c = data.filter(d => parseInt(e.target.value) === d.id) setCurrencyCookie('currency', c[0], { path: '/' }); window.location.reload() } return (
